scripts.drop: docker exec -i labs.database psql -U admin -d labsdb26 -c "DROP SCHEMA public CASCADE; CREATE SCHEMA public; GRANT ALL ON SCHEMA public TO public;"
scripts.lab2:ddl: docker exec -i labs.database psql -U admin -d labsdb < ./lab2/createTable.sql
scripts.lab2:seed: docker exec -i labs.database psql -U admin -d labsdb < ./lab2/seed.sql
scripts.lab5:ddl: docker exec -i labs.database psql -U admin -d labsdb < ./lab5/ddl_normalized.sql
